messages.content:
Categorize this IT Ticket:

update pm re version upgrade hello belong more believe updated status floor where connected thank developer pm version upgrade hello please advised update version version highly critical perform possible based availability order avoid virus attacks latest virus database available order update please follow steps more detailed guide found software center by searching software center search menu best endpoint agent install selected wait installation status becomes installed reboot computer icons newly installed endpoint tools note during update process lose approximately minutes questions encounter difficulties upgrading please hesitate thank kind regards ext hub
